class.name: VeloChannelID
class.author: Chris Parkes
class.desc: VeloChannelID is a class that describes a single channel of LHCb VELO.
* Now, only the sensor Number and strip number can be retrieved. * Intend to add R/Phi, station number.

constructor.argList: unsigned int sensor, unsigned int strip

method.name: setStrip
method.code: m_channelID &= stripMask; m_channelID |= ((unsigned long)(strip) << stripBits) & stripMask;

method.name: setSensor
method.code: m_channelID &= stripMask; m_channelID |= ((unsigned long)(sensor) << sensorBits) & sensorMask;

enum.desc: Enumeration to store the bit packing offsets
enum.name: bits

enum.desc: Enumeration to store the bit packing masks
enum.name: masks
